name: Solidex Finance
description: Solidex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for SOLID stakers and Solidly liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Solidex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning SEX token.

en.name: Solidex Finance
en.description: Solidex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for SOLID stakers and Solidly liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Solidex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning SEX token.

fr.name: Solidex Finance
fr.description: Solidex Finance est une plate-forme conçue pour augmenter les récompenses pour les stakers de jetons SOLID et les fournisseurs de liquidité sur Solidly – le tout avec une interface simple et facile à utiliser. Solidex Finance vise à simplifier le staking et la fourniture de liquidités avec son jeton SEX générateur d'intéret.

es.name: Solidex Finance
es.description: Solidex Finance es una plataforma creada para aumentar las recompensas para los participantes de SOLID y los proveedores de liquidez de Solidly - todo en una interfaz simple y fácil de usar. Solidex Finance tiene como objetivo simplificar el staking y la provisión de liquidez con su token SEX nativo que genera comisiones.

de.name: Solidex Finance
de.description: Solidex Finance ist eine Plattform, die die Belohnungen für SOLID-Staker und Solidly-Liquiditätsanbieter - über eine einfache und leicht zu bedienende Schnittstelle erhöht. Solidex Finance zielt darauf ab, das Staking und die Bereitstellung von Liquidität mit seinem gebührenpflichtigen SEX-Token zu vereinfachen.

pt.name: Solidex Finance
pt.description: Solidex Finance é uma plataforma construída para impulsionar recompensas para os stakers de SOLID e provedores de liquidez da plataforma Solidly - numa forma simples e com interface fácil de usar. Solidex Finance procura simplificar o processo de fornecimento de liquidez e staking com seu token nativo, recebedor de rendimentos, chamado SEX.

el.name: Solidex Finance
el.description: Solidex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for SOLID stakers and Solidly liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Solidex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning SEX token.

tr.name: Solidex Finance
tr.description: Solidex Finance, tümü basit ve kullanımı kolay bir arayüzde SOLID stake edenlerin ve Solidly likidite sağlayıcılarının ödüllerini artırmak için oluşturulmuş bir platformdur. Solidex Finance, yerel ücretli SEX belirteci ile stake ve likidite sağlamayı basitleştirmeyi amaçlıyor.

vi.name: Solidex Finance
vi.description: Solidex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for SOLID stakers and Solidly liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Solidex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning SEX token.

zh.name: Solidex Finance
zh.description: Solidex Finance 是个平台，提供简单易用的用户界面，主要目的是提升 SOLID 质押者和 Solidly 流动性提供者的奖励。 Solidex Finance 旨在通过其原生可赚取费用的 SEX 代币来为用户简化质押和流动性提供过程。

hi.name: Solidex Finance
hi.description: Solidex Finance, SOLID स्टेकर्स और Solidly लिक्विडिटी प्रोवाइडर्स के लिए पुरस्कार को बढ़ावा देने के लिए बनाया गया एक प्लेटफॉर्म है - सभी एक सरल और उपयोग में आसान इंटरफेस में। Solidex Finance का लक्ष्य अपने मूल शुल्क-अर्जित SEX टोकन के साथ हिस्सेदारी और तरलता प्रावधान को सरल बनाना है।

ja.name: Solidex Finance
ja.description: Solidex FinanceはSOLIDステーカーとSolidly流動性プロバイダーすべての報酬を高めるために構築されたプラットフォームであり、シンプルで使いやすいインターフェースを備えています。Solidex Financeは、そのネイティブな手数料稼ぐSEXトークンによりステーキングと流動性提供を簡素化することを目的としています。

id.name: Solidex Finance
id.description: Solidex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for SOLID stakers and Solidly liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Solidex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning SEX token.
